speaker.translate: спикер, громкоговоритель, оратор, диктор, говорящий, рупор
examples: The speaker had a very high voice.
I disagree with the last speaker.
The speaker paused.
The speaker droned on for an eternity.
The speaker wowed the audience.
He is a verbose speaker.
The speaker went for the profiteers.
The crowd jeered at the speaker
They gathered around the speaker.
This speaker commands a high fee.
The speaker allowed the objection.
He is an excellent public speaker.
The crowd laughed the speaker down.
Roosevelt was a captivating speaker.
The microphone is wired to the speaker.
The speaker faced his opponent down.
The crowd flocked around the speaker.
The speaker paused here for a moment.
The speaker sailed into his opponent.
He's renowned as a brilliant speaker.
The next speaker dittoed her argument.
The interruption flustered the speaker.
The chairman called on the next speaker.
The case was forcibly put by the speaker.
The speaker was bombarded with questions.
The speaker allowed the debate to continue.
Unexpected laughter embarrassed the speaker.
Bill Gates is booked as the keynote speaker.
She's an intelligent and articulate speaker.
the first speaker to address the convocation
example_translate: У докладчика был высокий, резкий голос.
Я не согласен с предыдущим оратором.
Выступающий обрушился с обвинениями на своего оппонента.
Эта заминка выбила докладчика из колеи.
В качестве основного докладчика заявлен Билл Гейтс.
Она — умный и умеющий ясно выражать свои мысли оратор.
